description: Template for research and analysis projects with literature review structure, hypothesis tracking, experiment design patterns, data analysis workflows, and citation management

included_components.name: task-management
included_components.description: Hierarchical task tracking with automatic parent completion, difficulty-based breakdown requirements, and status validation

files.name: literature-review-structure.md

files.description: Framework for formulating, documenting, testing, and tracking research hypotheses

files.description: Templates for designing rigorous experiments including RCTs, factorial designs, and observational studies

files.name: citation-management.md
files.description: Standards for tracking, formatting, and managing research citations and references

files.name: data-analysis-workflow.md
files.description: Structured workflow for data exploration, cleaning, transformation, analysis, and validation

files.name: literature-review-workflow.md
files.description: Systematic workflow for conducting literature reviews from search to synthesis

files.name: data-analysis-checklist.md
files.description: Comprehensive checklist for validating data quality, analysis methods, and result interpretation

files.name: statistical-methods-guide.md

research.literature: Literature reviews and notes (created as needed)
research.data: Raw and processed datasets (created as needed)

initialization_questions.impact: Determines which research workflows and standards to emphasize

initialization_questions.question: What is your research methodology?
initialization_questions.impact: Influences analysis workflows, documentation standards, and tool recommendations

initialization_questions.question: What tools will you use for data analysis?
initialization_questions.impact: Affects data analysis workflow templates and code standards

options: No - Analysis of existing data only

typical_tasks.note: High difficulty - should be broken down into model selection, training, validation, interpretation
